# OptionalColumnProtocol

**Protocol**

A type that represents a column that has missing values.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol OptionalColumnProtocol<WrappedElement> : ColumnProtocol
```

## Overview

`OptionalColumnProtocol` defines the common functionality for column types that support missing values.

## Filling an Optional Column

- **filled(with:)**: Generates a filled column by replacing missing elements with a value.

## Generating an Optional Column by Adding Two Columns

- **+(_:_:)**: Generates a column by adding each element in an optional column type to the corresponding elements of another.
- **+(_:_:)**: Generates a column by adding each element in a column type to the corresponding elements of an optional column type.
- **+(_:_:)**: Generates a column by adding each element in an optional column type to the corresponding elements of a column type.

## Generating an Optional Column by Subtracting Two Columns

- **-(_:_:)**: Generates a column by subtracting each element in an optional column type from the corresponding elements of another.
- **-(_:_:)**: Generates a column by subtracting each element in an optional column type from the corresponding elements of a column type.
- **-(_:_:)**: Generates a column by subtracting each element in a column type from the corresponding elements of an optional column.

## Generating an Optional Column by Multiplying Two Columns

- ***(_:_:)**: Generates a column by multiplying each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of another.
- ***(_:_:)**: Generates a column by multiplying each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of a column type.
- ***(_:_:)**: Generates a column by multiplying each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of an optional column type.

## Generating an Optional Column by Dividing Two Columns

- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of another.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of a column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of another.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of a column type.

## Generating an Optional Column by Combining a Value

- **+(_:_:)**: Generates a column by adding a value to each element in an optional column.
- **+(_:_:)**: Generates a column by adding each element in an optional column to a value.
- **-(_:_:)**: Generates a column by subtracting a value from each element in an optional column type.
- **-(_:_:)**: Generates a column by subtracting each element in an optional column from a value.
- ***(_:_:)**: Generates a column by multiplying each element in an optional column by a value.
- ***(_:_:)**: Generates a column by multiplying a value by each element in an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in an optional column by a value.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing a value by each element in an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in an optional column by a value.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing a value by each element in an optional column type.

## Describing an Optional Column

- **description(options:)**: Generates a string description of the optional column type.

## Supporting Types

- **WrappedElement**: The type of the optional column type’s elements.

## Typed Columns

- **Column**: A column in a data frame.
- **ColumnSlice**: A collection that represents a selection of contiguous elements from a typed column.
- **FilledColumn**: A view on a column that replaces missing elements with a default value.
- **DiscontiguousColumnSlice**: A collection that represents a selection, potentially with gaps, of elements from a typed column.
- **ColumnProtocol**: A type that represents a column.

## Inherits From

- BidirectionalCollection
- Collection
- ColumnProtocol
- Sequence

## Conforming Types

- Column
- ColumnSlice
- DiscontiguousColumnSlice
